team13.cmput301.recipefinder.controllers

Class IngredientManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • team13.cmput301.recipefinder.controllers.IngredientManager

  • public class IngredientManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the list of ingredients including the saving and loading of them from disk. CMPUT301 W13 T13
    Author:
    Han (Jim) Wen, Jessica Yuen, Shen Wei Liao, Fangyu Li
